TopicTitle: A fellow Kerbal In need of a rover design.

Articles.Content: I have tried countless times to get a worthy rover on the MÃƒÂ¼n, all ending in the same way. Explosions. I would appreciate if someone could help with a (How should I put this?....) noob-friendly rover design that won't explode when to try to disconnect it from my MÃƒÂ¼nar Lander. Thanks, and Happy Kerbaling!
There is the stock one that is attached to a skycrane that works pretty well.
You could try looking for something in "the Spacecraft Exchange" section of the forum. I'd be surprised if there wasn't a rover there.
